description: From Hindi सुरमा (surmā) / Urdu سرمہ‎ (surmā), from Persian سرمه‎ (sorme).

entries.meaning: A preparation of antimony with which Muslim men historically anointed their eyelids.
examples: It is incumbent on the Mussulman that he should stain the crevices of his teeth black with the soorma […]
